description: Fix the divide function to properly divide by parameter b instead of hardcoded 0, and add proper error handling for division by zero. Also fix the add function which was incorrectly multiplying instead of adding. - Fix add function to perform addition instead of multiplication

metadata.solution_description: Fix the divide function to properly divide by parameter b instead of hardcoded 0, and add proper error handling for division by zero. Also fix the add function which was incorrectly multiplying instead of adding.
